data.title: Keeping Utah Moving
data.text:
UDOT is currently developing the Disadvantaged Business Enterprise (DBE) goal for Federal fiscal years 2025-2027. The draft DBE Goal and Methodology Report can be found on the UDOT Civil Rights webpage. Comments may be provided to UDOT by sending an email to civilrights@utah.gov. The document will be available for review and comment from August 5, 2024 […]

Zero Fatalities urges everyone to drive safe this Pioneer Day Twelve people died on Utah’s roads last week — the worst one-week total in almost two years, according to the Utah Department of Transportation (UDOT) and Utah Department of Public Safety (DPS). This spike in fatalities concerns Utah officials, since the state is in the […]

East-west travel at the intersection to close as crews work to build new interchange and remove one more stoplight on the highway The Utah Department of Transportation (UDOT) urges drivers and pedestrians to plan ahead for a year-long closure of 4700 South at Bangerter Highway on the West Valley City and Taylorsville border. The closure […]

The Charles Hall Ferry returns to service July 4th providing passage over Lake Powell between Bullfrog and Halls Crossing. The ferry is scheduled to make four round-trips daily during the summer, departing Halls Crossing every two hours beginning at 10:00 a.m. Initially the ferry will operate Thursdays through Sundays and fee payment will be cash […]
